data.message: Yeah It's not so bad, if only I could say the same about your trump diss. Not even a big trump fan but shit was whack

replies.message: You're wack. Get your Trump ass out of here.
Love to see you come off the top of your head and do better. Because I got news for you, most of your favorite 'freestyle' rappers ain't freestylin'. They're spittin' pre-rehearsed shit.
If a white guy starts a sentence with " not even a trump fan but..." They lying
Im not a rapper and even now after his huge decline he's still more talented then me no doubt. I love em but just not his new shit keeps getting progressively worse imo

Philip I hate nearly all politicians and most millionaires and I've no reason to lie just stating popular opinion it seems. Eminem is always gonna be number one I just think that freestyle will go down as arguably his worst piece of art yet
Get off his page then you fucking trump dick rider 😂
You say is Wack but you don't know what dope is.
It was lyrically wacked lmfao... I expected alot harder than shit like "That's an awful hot coffee pot should I drop it on Donald Trump probably not" no seriously WTH is that !
Exactly LOL ^
Get out of here then bitch
Wtf
Most WACK freestyle ever. Don't be an Eminem dick rider people....

Joshua Francis this isn’t a freestyle genius lol

You should educated your uncultured ass what freestyle is. It was more about the message than the rhyme. He was coming up with that off the top of his head.

Bruce Newberry, he came up with it on the spot. Also, your hating ass took that one line to hate on the rest. He also had a few gold ones like "He don't got the nuts like an empty asylum." But it was more about the message than the rhyme.
fuck you're a pussy lmaooo
